KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Potato:
A Potato Seed. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Tool_PlantCurePotion: Used to cure diseased plants and bring them back to a healthy state.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Redberry:
A redberry seed. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Dwellberry:
A dwellberry seed. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_Waterbarrel: Unlocks the Water Barrel, which stores Clean or Dirty Water collected from Watering Cans for later use.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_Composter: Unlocks the Compost Bin and Compost Bucket recipes. These allow for creating and using Normal Compost to boost the yield and disease resistance of your plants.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Cabbage:
Cabbage Seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Flax:
Flax seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.Notification_NoPlantCurePotionInInventor: No Plant Cure available in your inventory to cure this plant.
KeysToEntries.Notification_ContainerItem_CantHoldCompo: No empty buckets in inventory to fill with compost.
KeysToEntries.Notification_ContainerItem_CantHoldWater: No empty buckets in inventory to fill with water.
KeysToEntries.Notification_WaterBarrel_NothingInInvent: No water in any Watering Cans to fill this Barrel with.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Onion:
Onion Seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Wheat:
Some Wheat Seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Tomato:
Tomato Seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Pumpkin:
Pumpkin Seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Fellhollow plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_CorpseCotton:
Corpse cotton seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Fellhollow plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Cadavaberry:
A handful of Cadavaberry seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!


Best Planted in Fellhollow plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_T1_Plot: A Plot made from Ash logs, plants found in Brynmoor grow better in this plot
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_T2_Plot: A Plot made from Oak logs, plants found in Ghornfell grow better in this plot
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_T3_Plot: A Plot made from Willow, plants found in Fellhollow grow better in this plot
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Building_Scarecrow: A wooden friend to protect your crops and keep you company in the fields.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_Scarecrow: Unlocks the Scarecrow for protecting you farm from feathered annoyances.
KeysToEntries.Description_RainCatcher: Collects and filters rain water into usable Clean Water over time.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_PlantCure: Unlocks the ability to create Plant Cures at the Cooking Range! Use Plant Cures to heal your plants from disease.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_Recovery_Chance: Increases the chance of finding seeds when you harvest plants from both your farms and the world.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Watermelon:
Watermelon seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Fellhollow plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Harralander:
Harralander seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Marrentill:
Marrentill seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Brynmoor plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_seed_Snapdragon:
Snapdragon seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Toadflax:
Toadflax seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Irit:
Irit seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Fellhollow plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Bucket_Wood:
{HeldContainerDescription}

A wooden bucket used to carry a variety of Compost. Pour it's contents out over a Farming Plot to Fertilize your plants!
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_WateringCan_Bronze:
{HeldContainerDescription}

A bronze watering can. Can be filled at any water source.Used for watering crops in Farming Plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_WateringCan_Steel:
{HeldContainerDescription}

A Steel watering can. Can be filled at any water source. Used for watering crops in Farming Plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Composter: Deposit all of your unwanted food or plant matter to turn it into compost over time.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Building_WaterBarrel: A barrel for storing either Clean or Dirty Water, filled using Watering Cans.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Tree_Ash:
Ash tree seeds. 

Plant this directly into the ground to grow your own Tree!
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Tree_Oak:
Oak Tree Seeds. 

Plant this directly into the ground to grow your own Tree!
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Tree_Willow:
Willow Tree Seeds. 

Plant this directly into the ground to grow your own Tree!
KeysToEntries.SpellDescription_Humidify: Conjure Water magic to create a rain cloud that travels forward, instantly watering any Farming Plot that it passes over with Clean Water.
KeysToEntries.SpellDescription_Humidify_Upgrade: Upgrades the Humidify Spell, causing the conjured rain cloud to cure any diseased plants it passes over alongside watering them.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Tool_Secateurs: A pair of gardening Secateurs that boost your harvesting yield while equipped.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_SpeedyFarmer: You've become more adapt at watering and composting your plants. You can now do so with less pentalty to your movement speed!
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_TreeFarming: You are skilled enough at farming to now grow Trees! Trees can be planted directly into the ground and seeds can be found while chopping down trees and from birds nests.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Building_Well: Unlocks the ability to build a Well! A Well provides a limited amount of Clean Water per day. Wells refill in the morning.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Tool_Shovel_Bronze:
A basic Spade made from Bronze. 

Used to clear farming plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Tool_Shovel_Steel:
A robust Spade made from Steel. 

Used to clear farming plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Tool_Shovel_Wood:
A rudimentary Spade made from Ash wood. 

Used to clear farming plots.
KeysToEntries.Notification_InvalidPlotForSeed: The seed will not grow in this plot
KeysToEntries.Notification_InvalidShovelForPlot: The Spade is not strong enough to dig in this plot.
KeysToEntries.Notification_PlotIncorrectStateForPlanti: The plot has to be empty to plant a seed
KeysToEntries.Notification_CannotDestroyContainerNotEm: Only empty containers can be destroyed.
KeysToEntries.Description_Well: Allows you to draw a limited amount of Clean Water per day. Wells refill in the morning.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_Waterbarrel_Large: Unlocks the Large Water Barrel, which stores even more Clean or Dirty Water collected from Watering Cans for later use.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Building_WaterBarrel_Large: A large barrel for storing greater amounts of Clean or Dirty Water, filled using Watering Cans.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Perk_ComposterSuper: Unlocks the Super Compost Bin which produces Super Compost, for an even better yield boost and disease resistance of your plants.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_ComposterSuper: Deposit all of your unwanted nutrient rich food or plant matter to turn it into Super Compost over time.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_WateringCan_Wood:
{HeldContainerDescription}

A Watering Can made from Ash Wood. Can be filled at any water source. Used for watering crops in Farming Plots.
KeysToEntries.Notification_Well_Empty: This Well has run dry for today.
KeysToEntries.Notification_ContainerItem_CantHoldWater: No empty watering can in inventory to fill with clean water.
No empty watering can in inventory to fill with dirty water.
KeysToEntries.Notification_ContainerItem_CantHoldSuper: No empty buckets in inventory to fill with Super compost.
KeysToEntries.Notification_ContainerItem_CantHoldUltra: No empty buckets in inventory to fill with Ultra compost.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Kwuarm:
Kwuarm seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.Notification_InvalidSpotForTreePlanting: You cannot plant a tree here
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_TooFarAwayFromG: Too far away from the ground
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_CannotPlaceTree: The tree wouldn't grow in here
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_CannotPlaceInPr: You cannot plant trees in this area
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_TooCloseToAnoth: There is not enough space for the tree here
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_NotEnoughSpaceO: There is not enough overhead space for the tree to grow
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_IncorrectRegion: The tree is not native to this region
KeysToEntries.Notification_TreeFarming_CannotPlaceTree: This ground is not suitable for tree growth
KeysToEntries.Notification_Plot_Protected: This plot is protected by the host
KeysToEntries.Description_Compost_Regular: Fertilizing a plot with this is beneficial to it's yield.
KeysToEntries.Description_Compost_Super: Fertilizing a plot with this is very beneficial to it's yield.
KeysToEntries.NoPlotWhenTryToPlantSeed: The seed must be planted in a plot.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Seed_Swampweed:
Swamp weed seeds. Equip and use them to scatter these into a farming plot and start growing!

Best Planted in Ghornfell plots.
KeysToEntries.FlavourText_Tool_Shovel_Undead:
A strangely spooky spade.

Used to clear farming plots.
